programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Novas toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep41
programme.desc: The Neverending Clover - After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep29
programme.desc: The Hunted - Lotor seizes the opportunity and lures the Paladins to Thayserix, a mysterious gas planet

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep30
programme.desc: Hole In The Sky - After an emergency beacon draws Team Voltron to an ancient derelict Altean ship stuck in a temporal rift, the team is transported to an alternate universe.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep3
programme.desc: Stink of Fear: Chapter Three - When Bullwinkle remembers he forgot the secret ingredient to his stinky pie recipe, he and Rocky travel to Norway and enlist the help of his beloved Grandwinkle, not knowing that they are being followed!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep4
programme.desc: Stink of Fear: Chapter Four - Director Peachfuzz recruits Rocky and Bullwinkle to help her infiltrate Fearless Leaders hideout, and Boris and Natasha are replaced by a robot henchman

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep30
programme.desc: Climate Control / Ziryab - When Hobson gives Peabody and Sherman a weather-controlling device, they can't agree on a temperature and cause a massive storm flood in the Penthouse

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep127
programme.desc: Impatient Christopher - Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep128
programme.desc: The Statue of Friendship - Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep317
programme.desc: All Star Pups! - Its monkey mayhem as pups play kickball against Raimondos team, until an eagle steals the ball.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep308
programme.desc: The Name's Chomp / Cactus-Throphe - Bobbi's galactic flapjacks attract a spaceship from another galaxy. It's Captain Chomp and her co-pilot, Kenny a prehistoric mammoth! // Steel uses a super-growth fertiliser to grow giant cacti flowers to replace Lady Fluffpot's bottle of perfume.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep317
programme.desc: Pups Save Sports Day - The All Star Pups are ready to compete in the summer sports day when Daring Danny X turns the field into an ice rink!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers / Pups Save the Cupcakes - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep111
programme.desc: New New Year / Finders Keepers / Busy Buddies - Bossy is worried his family does not celebrate the Korean New Year "the right way. // Bossy finds a cool toy but doesn't want to give it up. // Bossy and Turtle overtask themselves when they take on all class jobs at once.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup - Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Tina's New Friend - While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep705
programme.desc: Paramedic Power - When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Sink or Swim - The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep214

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep312

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Cheesy Feet - Messy thinks smelly socks and cheesy feet are brilliant! But when it's Lofty's feet that smell, it's a giant problem...

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Colours - Messy and friends are left feeling blue when the vacubots suck all the colour out of OKIDO!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Piggy Portrait - Monty and Gran do some painting, and Monty wonders whether all paintings have to look like the things being painted.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep4
programme.desc: It's Time To Open a Shop - After visiting Jared's shop, JoJo and Gran Gran set up their own shop at home - if you pay with panda pounds, you can buy anything and everything.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep5
programme.desc: It's Time To Invent - Gran Gran's keys get stuck behind the sofa. Inspired by inventors from the past, JoJo and Gran Gran invent a 'key collector' to get them back!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Cloud Tower - A search for shade on a hot day leads Sarah and Duck to discover a fascinating tower in the park.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Sound Jumble - When Sarah hears some interesting music on the radio, she and Duck try to recreate it.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep4
programme.desc: Panicky Percy - Percy causes confusion for everyone and prompts delays, when he spends too much time panicking over nothing.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep3
programme.desc: Heart of Gold - Toby's passengers can't stop making fun of him, that is until he discovers two villains trying to steal King Godred's crown.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep34
programme.desc: The Dump - On a trip to the Dump, Dad claims he's the best at everything. But Bluey discovers that Dad's throwing out her old drawing and questions if he really is the best Dad in the world.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grape Kids' Super Camp - Supertato shows the Grape Kids how to camp Supertato-style, but Evil Pea arrives and wows them with her ice camping. Before long, the Grape Kids need to be rescued by Supertato.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Teamwork Badge - A box full of bits and pieces is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are excited. Duggee and the Squirrels are going to have to work hard to put it all together. Time for a bit of teamwork.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep13
programme.desc: The Dancing Bug Badge - When a dancing bug lands on Duggee's head, he can't stop dancing. The Squirrels see that it's a tiny hillbilly bug with a fiddle. And what's more, he's got a band with him - the Hillbilly Bug Band.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep14
programme.desc: The Train Badge - Duggee is playing with his train set. Choo-choo! Hennie arrives and she has a train too. The squirrels ask if they can play with it. You can't play with it; you can play IN it says Hennie!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Mountain Gorillas, The Democratic Republic of the Congo - The Go Jetters race to save a family of mountain gorillas from traps left by hunters and also from a sneezy Grandmaster Glitch's germs.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Go Jetter or No Jetter? - Foz starts to think his team doesn't need him anymore. Can Tala convince him he still has what it takes to be a Go Jetter, or will he follow Glitch down a different path?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Mariana Trench: The Pacific Ocean - With the help of his hero Ron Allum, Lars plans to dive to the bottom of the Mariana Trench in a submersible called the Deep Sea Challenger.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S1 Ep11
programme.desc: City Parks - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how city parks play such an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Alligators - When Andy inadvertently destroys an audio tape of a recording that Mr Hammond made of a baby alligator, it's up to him to replace it.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep14
programme.desc: The Big Book of Pirate World Records - Captain Captain wants to get Sandy, Seaweed and herself into the Big Book of Pirate World Records and sets the pirates the task of trying to break a record to get their names in the book!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep15
programme.desc: Pirate Yearbook - Captain Captain is busy looking at last year's Pirate Yearbook, but something is wrong with her picture! So Captain Captain tells the pirates to come up with a better photo for this year's edition!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep29

programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Belles A Ringin' - While buying romance novels for a heartbroken Ellen, Nate discovers they are total cash cows. Under a pen name, he writes a best-selling graphic novel using the people in his life as inspiration until it catches up to him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep265
programme.desc: Bubble Bass's Tab / Kooky Cooks - Bubble Bass avoids paying his bill at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob and Squidward are sent to collect the cash. // Mr. Krabs makes Spongebob and Squidward cook a fancy meal for Mrs. Puff, but every dish becomes a dispute.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep266
programme.desc: Escape From Beneath Glove World - SpongeBob and Patrick are sent to jail in the underground tunnels of Glove World, leading to a daring escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Goin Clubbin' / Totally Board - After beating Hugo at a game of Crazy Golf, Raj needs to find a way to get back in his good graces.// The death-defying day of skate is coming to town and Sammy finally has a chance to prove to Hugo that he's not 'Silly Sammy'.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Cheer Pressure / Stroke of Luck - Lori becomes a celebrity at school when she hits a hole-in-one on a notoriously difficult course. // The cheerleaders challenge Lynn and her teammates to a 'cheer off' when Lynn dismisses them as athletes.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Space Jammed / Crown and Dirty - Annoyed by Leni's intrusive babysitting, Lisa accidentally blasts herself and Todd into space. // Lola tries to whip Mom into tip-top pageant condition for a Mother-Daughter pageant.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Ogre Love - Big Mouth falls in love with Smurfette after she pulls a splinter from his thumb.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Back to Nature/Okey-Dokey! - When Vanity, Poet and Dimwitty get lost in the forest, Papa Smurf sends them to Wild for nature lessons. // Jokey has a new prank: giving Grouchy a potion that makes him say "okey dokey" to every request.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Drooling Fool / Patrick's Got An Alien Zoo Loose - Patrick's uncontrollable drooling gets out of hand and mouth. // A shape-shifting alien runs loose in the Star home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep269
programme.desc: Under the Small Top / Squidward's Sick Daze - Squidward's house becomes infested with a mail-order flea circus meant for SpongeBob. // Squidward fakes being sick to get out of work, but his agony only begins when SpongeBob arrives to care for him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep270
programme.desc: Goofy Scoopers / Pat the Dog - SpongeBob and Patrick make it their mission to reunite the recently fires robot band from Goofy Goober's. // Patrick is sent to the pound for acting like a worm, but he won't be able to leave unless SpongeBob can train him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep271
programme.desc: Something Narwhal This Way Comes / C.H.U.M.S. - Two familiar faces from SpongeBob's past visit Bikini Bottom, but they bring a big problem along with them. // After falling down the drain, Plankton finds an unlikely ally in the sewers.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep120
programme.desc: What's Love Gato Do With It? / Dial M. For Mustard - After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking he's a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Undivided Attention - Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pearl Wants to Be a Star / Super Sitters - Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show. // Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Secret Legacy Pt. 1 - Robby has trouble adjusting after their family's big move to the rural town of Witwicky, until he and his sister, Mo, discover the first-ever Earthborn Transformers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep212
programme.desc: The Incredible Shrinking Sponge / Sportz? - SpongeBob must figure out how to do his job after accidentally shrinking himself. // Squidward invents a new sport to get back at SpongeBob and Patrick for annoying him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep213
programme.desc: The Getaway / Lost and Found - When SpongeBob mistakes an escaped convict for his driving instructor, it's the new teacher who learns a lesson. // When Krabs sends him searching for a missing toy, SpongeBob finds himself lost... in the lost & found!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep214
programme.desc: Patrick's Coupon / Out of the Picture - Patrick has a coupon for free ice cream, but he'll have to get to the store if he wants to use it! // Krabs buys Squidward's art, but to make a profit on his purchase he'll have to get the artist out of the picture!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Game Show - Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Allergic Reaction / Lice-enced to Teach - While training for a TV baking competition with Eleanor, Theodore develops an allergy to an unknown ingredient. // After a lice outbreak that closes the school, Dave sets up a classroom in the house acting as their teacher.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Animal House Party / Dr. Zap vs Electroboy - When Derek overhears that Alvin and his brothers are alone for the weekend, he plans a wild party at their house. // Theodore is hit by lightning and believes he's like his comic book hero, until he's told he's actually a villain.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S03 Ep311
programme.desc: The Pig and the Rhino - Donnie finishes a new batch of retro-mutagen, hoping to save Karai, but the Turtles find themselves hunted by Shredder's new vengeful henchmen. Bebop and Rocksteady!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Battle for New York Part 1 - Leo doesn't trust Slash when he emerges leading a team called the "Mighty Mutanimals".

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Battle for New York Part 2 - While the Mighty Mutanimals lay siege to TCRI, the Turtles must brave the bizarre world of Dimension X to save the enslaved people of New York.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Avatar and The Firelord - Aang and Zuko are taken on parallel adventures that give them insight into their forefathers' pasts - but how does the tale of Roku and Sozin matter to them now?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep307
programme.desc: The Runaway - When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep308
programme.desc: The Puppetmaster - In a Halloween installment, the gang looks into strange disappearances in a spooky town. There, an old lady named Hama teaches Katara some secret Waterbending techniques.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Nightmares and Daydreams - On the eve of the eclipse, Aang's anxiety gets the better of him. His dreams become nightmares, and soon he can no longer tell dream from reality.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Chess-a-pult / Smart & Smarter - Best and Bester turn themselves into chess pieces but have to abandon their game to save the sub from flooding. // Bester and Best are tasked with neutralising the enemy agent's ransomware for the Bettervale Investigation Bureau.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Taken to the Cleaners / Mugshot - Best and Bester go on an undercover mission to find out why items of laundry are going missing at the Dry Cleaners. // In an unfortunate case of mistaken identity, Best has been mistaken for the notorious jewel thief, Jimmy Muggins.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep116
programme.desc: In the Sky / Best Buddies - When Diamondo refuses to give the twins a ride in his spaceship they embark on some space exploration of their own. // Best becomes entangled in a series of awkward situations when he pretends to know someone he's never met before.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Teeny Pelican Terry / Tappin Mo and Bo - A mama pelican thinks Teeny Terry is a baby bird... and adopts him! // Mo and Bo discover tap dancing, but the sound is disturbing everyone in the hotel.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Grumbles' First Cut / Fuzzly Ball - Grumbles needs a haircut, but he's afraid to get one. // Abby tries to throw the perfect Ball for Princess Flug.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep119
programme.desc: Gullible Pants / Overbooked - SpongeBob is left in charge of the Krusty Krab while Mr. Krabs steps out for 15 minutes, and he is determined to make it the best-managed 15 minutes ever! // SpongeBob's got a full day, and he's determined to do everything he's scheduled to do.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep120
programme.desc: No Hat for Pat / Toy Store Of Doom - Patrick is sick of all of his friends not being able to play with him because they have to put on their Krusty Krab hats and go to work. // A new toy store has opened up in Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob and Patrick couldn't be happier!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep121
programme.desc: Sand Castles in the Sand / Shell Shocked - A friendly day of building sand castles soon turns into war when SpongeBob and Patrick use their sand creations to battle each other. // Gary desperately needs a new shell, but all the shells on the market are either too expensive or too fragile.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep209
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Place - When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep122
programme.desc: Chum Bucket Supreme / Single Cell Anniversary - Plankton hires Patrick to create advertising slogans for the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob helps Plankton find the perfect anniversary gift for Karen.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep93
programme.desc: Picture Day / Pat No Pay / Blackjack - It's Picture Day for the Boating School Year Book. // When Patrick eats his weight in Krabby Patties without paying, Mr. Krabs puts him to work in the restaurant. // SpongeBob's parents are missing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep94
programme.desc: Blackened Sponge / Mermaid Man vs. Sponge - SpongeBob accidentally punches himself in the face leaving behind a hideous black eye, but is too embarrassed to tell anyone the truth. // Plankton has brainwashed Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Little Drummer Boy - When Alvin insists on taking over the drums from Theodore, Theodore fights back by mimicking Alvin and stealing his persona.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Special Ingredient - As Theodore is perfecting a pancake recipe, Alvin plays a trick by pouring burping powder in his next batch.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep519
programme.desc: Alvin Gets Schooled - When Dave learns Alvin blamed him for his poor grades to Miss Smith, Dave sets down a very strict study schedule.

programme.desc: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort - The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Guess Who's Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie - Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Strife of the Party / Kernel of Truth - When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. // Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Cow Pie Kid / Saved by the Spell - Lynn pushes Liam to his limits when he becomes the star pitcher for the middle school baseball team. // Lincoln's friends try to stop him from performing a magic act at the middle school talent show.

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Case of the Moon-Days / Portrait of a Monster - In order to evade Monster Hunters, Clawdeen must accept who she is to save herself and Cleo. // Frankie's identity crisis during picture days causes her to ZAP a camera into a live, soulsucking menace.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep224
programme.desc: Squid Noir / Scavenger Pants - When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Big News with Blue - Blue has something exciting to tell everybody! In this game of Blue's Clues, Josh and the viewer go on a note finding quest, solving riddles, and following treasure maps to find out the answer to Blue's Big News.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Darren and Ruth have found a large patch of land near the Melbourne Cricket Ground. Hidden down a laneway with no street frontage, this secret garden will be transformed into a contemporary three-story family mansion.

programme.title: ABC News Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Calls for change in a quiet coastal town after bushfire left residents with no means of escape, endangered baby turtles get a second chance at life, and Tiwi Islanders put on a football grand final like no other.

programme.title: ABC News Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Heywire
programme.desc: Young people from all across Australia share their personal stories of growing up in regional Australia, as we bring you the best short films from the 2023 Heywire project. Hosted by Isaac Muller.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Mariam Saab presents the day's news and reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Presenter Heather Ewart starts the summer season in the idyllic beachside village of Brunswick Heads in northern New South Wales and discovers the surprising joys of life in a holiday town.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - We want look at the ingredients of Australian cuisine. A combination of First Nations, Multiculturalism, and one of England and the United Kingdom's greatest legacies - the pub.

programme.title: War On Waste Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Craig Reucassel dives deep into Australia's waste crisis to sort the facts from the PR spin, meet new waste warriors, and track down fresh everyday solutions to help all of us do our part in the 'War on Waste'.

programme.title: Save This Shark Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Mick Fanning continues his mission by travelling to the world's shark hotspots, where he gets a closer look at the incredible apex predators.

programme.title: Framed Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A Picasso has been stolen from the National Gallery of Victoria and the thieves are making sure everybody knows about it. Who is behind these bizarre ransom notes and what have they done with the Weeping Woman?

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2022 - The Video Lab team look into an experiment to see Dark Matter, and examine the space junk dilemma.

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In this summer special of China Tonight, Sam Yang and Annie Louey take a look at the historical events that have shaped one of the most fascinating and complex countries in the world.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Ernie explores the ancient forests and shifting sand dunes of Pemberton, Bianca breaks into the drag queen scene of Broken Hill and Aaron's language and dance is put to the test back home in Bamaga.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: The Pacific: Summer Special Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A look back at some of our favourite stories from the Pacific. We go to Solomon Islands where the legacy of WWII is still felt. Plus we hear from two Pacific music legends Jean Gabilou and American Idol winner Iam Tongi.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Special Ep181
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Where is Australia at on the road to net zero? In this special summer episode of The Business, Kirsten Aiken looks back at some of the biggest renewables and green energy stories of 2023.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Chris and Belinda bought the land next door to their existing house, just 3.9 metres wide: a tiny gap in a long row of heritage listed cottages in Sydney's Forest Lodge. They plan to build a uniquely sustainable house.

programme.title: Outback Musical
programme.desc: Outback students scattered across sheep and cattle properties overcome distance, drought and disability to put on a show from home as they realise their dreams, dancing, bull-riding and lawn bowling towards the big night.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Many parents worry their children are gaming to excess and don't know how to deal with it. Psychologist Wayne Warburton says he can help, with an Australia-first program tackling problem gaming. Will it work?

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Everyone loves leftovers, so we're re-heating some of our favourite stories. Sam Yang and Annie Louey look at China's culinary delights and how reality TV delivers a serious message about the real threat of food security.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The children of Australia's meth crisis. Thousands of Australian babies are born exposed to their mothers' drug use every year. We investigate what's being done to tackle one of the hidden side effects of the drug epidemic.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Calls for change in a quiet coastal town after bushfire left residents with no means of escape, endangered baby turtles get a second chance at life, and Tiwi Islanders put on a football grand final like no other.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. Ditching plastic for plant alternatives and shark-cage diving and the abalone industry.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Bridget Brennan bring you news and interviews, Emma Rebellato with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - When big stories break, turn to ABC News in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. We have more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Doctor at the Door: The McClellands Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 22 - How much could a doctor change your life if they saw how you lived? In a Catalyst special, Dr. Preeya Alexander prescribes lifestyle interventions for a couple who struggle with excess weight, and their fussy eating son.

programme.title: War On Waste Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Craig Reucassel dives deep into Australia's waste crisis to sort the facts from the PR spin, meet new waste warriors, and track down fresh everyday solutions to help all of us do our part in the 'War on Waste'.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. The family cattle business enjoying the benefits of cutting carbon emissions plus Australian research growing the beekeeping industry in the Pacific.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Calls for change in a quiet coastal town after bushfire left residents with no means of escape, endangered baby turtles get a second chance at life, and Tiwi Islanders put on a football grand final like no other.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep7

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Mediterranean Journey Crete Greece - Locals call it the "Island of the Gods because as legend would have it, Zeus was born here.Crete is the largest Greek island. It offers stunning stretches of coastline, beautiful port towns like gios Niklaos, as well as picturesque mountainscapes. After Spain and Italy, Greece is the worlds third largest producer of olive oil. Crete is also suffering the impact of climate change and the resulting aridity. Thats why researchers Ioannis Daliakopoulos and Anargyros Sideris are trying to find ways to support local farmers. Community plays a key role in Greek culture, and dance is an important aspect of national identity.
